about.title: About Me
about.description:
Software Engineer / Backend Developer with over **6 years of experience** in designing, developing, and scaling **cloud-native web applications** and **high-availability RESTful APIs** across sectors such as e-commerce, oil & gas, fintech, and corporate events. I have participated in **monolith-to-microservices migrations**, process automation, and the construction of mission-critical enterprise platforms.

I possess solid experience in **Node.js, TypeScript, Express, NestJS, SQL, AWS, and CI/CD**, as well as **Java and Spring Boot**, with a high **capacity to adapt to new stacks and backend architectures**. I have **led and mentored technical teams**, actively contributing to the continuous improvement of quality, security, performance, and scalability.
